title: Enhancing Reflective Practice Competencies Using Online Communication Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning platforms and organizational communication
context.additional_context: For corporate leaders/managers, cultivating the ability to establish effective organizational communication strategies by sharing reflective practice experiences using various online communication tools (email, collaboration platforms, social media, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can compare structural and symbolic characteristics of various online communication tools and select the optimal one for specific contexts.
Learners develop reflective practice competencies by analyzing communication cases through Bolman & Deal’s four perspectives: structural, human resources, political, and symbolic.
Learners perform real-world work-linked projects in a PBL environment, identifying constraints encountered during tool utilization and proposing improvement strategies.

resources: Free Accounts for Collaboration Tools (Slack, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
